official_title: To establish that it is the policy of the United States that public lands be used for public utility infrastructure before private lands are condemned for such purpose, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that it is U.S. policy that public lands be used for the siting of electric utility transmission facilities and other utility infrastructure before private property is acquired by condemnation for such purposes.

titles.title: To establish that it is the policy of the United States that public lands be used for public utility infrastructure before private lands are condemned for such purpose, and for other purposes.
